roleset.name: be a pedestrian

example.name: with COM
example.text: Monica Sharp went out for a walk with her dog weeks ago
example.note: This almost fits as containing agent and patient walkers... but it ultimately is being handled more like a COM in this instance (arguably, 'she went walking with her dog' is not quite the same as 'she walked her dog')

example.name: just arg2
example.text: @NASA says it may decide by tomorrow whether another space walk will be needed to fix torn thermal blanket that blew a cockpit window

example.name: Light Verb
example.text: "Those people who are always complaining about their lot in life should take a walk around a cancer ward , " Li says .
example.arg: Those people who are always complaining about their lot in life

example.name: just arg0
example.text: The normal walk of the dog can be encumbered by long toenails.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based loosly on walk-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls run-51.3.2.

roleset.name: walk the batter in baseball

example.name: just arg 1
example.text: Danielson facilitated the Waterford strategy by calling a time out to discuss an intentional walk of the batter, Alex Tuneski.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on walk-v.02. No VNcls.
